document.full_text: the lesson autocrats are taking from the arab spring is that those who quit, like hosni mubarak of egypt, face humiliation, while those who continue to use force gain leverage.
document.title: memo from cairo: embattled arab leaders decide it's better to fight than quit
lines_and_colors: the lesson autocrats are taking from the arab spring is that those who quit, like hosni mubarak of egypt, face humiliation, while those who continue to use force gain leverage.
